entry.title: New release for Wizarr: 2025.6.4
entry.content:
What's New in Wizarr 2025.6.4

This update brings some big improvements and helpful fixes! âœ¨ Features & Improvements

  • Multiple Server Support & Identity Linking â€“ You can now manage multiple media servers directly within Wizarr! ğŸ‰
  • Wizard Access Restriction â€“ Admins can now control who has access to the setup wizard.
  • Smarter Code Placeholder â€“ Example codes now show with the correct character length.
  • Translated Server Errors â€“ Error messages now support translations for better clarity across languages.
  • Better Ownership Handling â€“ chown now runs reliably for all users during setup.
  • General bug fixes

ğŸ›  Dependency Updates

  • Tailwind CSS & CLI bumped to 4.1.10
  • requests updated to 2.32.4
  • boto3 updated to 1.38.36

entry.title: New release for Wizarr: 2025.6.5
entry.content:
ğŸ‰ Whatâ€™s New in Wizarr 2025.6.5

This release brings some exciting enhancements, a brand-new UI feature, and a bunch of behind-the-scenes improvements!

âœ¨ New Features

  • ğŸ§™ Editable Wizard UI: You can now manage wizard steps directly from the interface â€“ add, edit, reorder, or delete steps with ease.
  • ğŸ“¦ ROMM Support Added: Wizarr now plays nicely with [ROMM](https://github.com/rommapp/romm), making retro game library integration smoother than ever.

ğŸ›  Improvements & Fixes

  • ğŸ§  Fixed API issues with Jellyfin/Emby where parameters weren't passed correctly.
  • âš™ï¸ Improved asset build system for a faster, more reliable setup.
  • ğŸª² General bug fixes and performance tweaks to keep things running smoothly.

ğŸ“¦ Dependency Updates

  • HTMX updated to 2.0.5 for better frontend performance.
  • Markdown, Boto3, and Cachetools bumped to their latest stable versions for security and stability.

ğŸ‘‹ New Contributors

  • Big thanks to @techfahter and @arch1eOS for their first contributions!

entry.title: New release for Wizarr: 2025.7.1
entry.content:
Bug fixes: - Plex API hotfix (deprecated) - Deleting a Step Causes broken CSS

What's Changed

  • Bump @tailwindcss/cli from 4.1.10 to 4.1.11 in /app/static by @dependabot in https://github.com/wizarrrr/wizarr/pull/659
  • Bump tailwindcss from 4.1.10 to 4.1.11 in /app/static by @dependabot in https://github.com/wizarrrr/wizarr/pull/660
  • build(deps): bump htmx.org from 2.0.5 to 2.0.6 in /app/static by @dependabot in https://github.com/wizarrrr/wizarr/pull/663
  • build(deps): bump python-dotenv from 1.1.0 to 1.1.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/wizarrrr/wizarr/pull/664
  • build(deps): bump boto3 from 1.38.41 to 1.38.46 by @dependabot in https://github.com/wizarrrr/wizarr/pull/665

Full Changelog: https://github.com/wizarrrr/wizarr/compare/2025.6.5...2025.7.1
